mapper.select: select sa.author_id as authorId, sa.create_date as createDate, sa.disabled, sa.id, sa.maxlat, sa.maxlng, sa.minlat, sa.minlng from t_studyarea sa where sa.author_id = #{authorId} and sa.maxlat > #{lat} and sa.minlat < #{lat} and sa.maxlng > #{lng} and sa.minlng < #{lng} and sa.disabled = 0
select sa.author_id as authorId, sa.create_date as createDate, sa.disabled, sa.id, sa.maxlat, sa.maxlng, sa.minlat, sa.minlng from t_studyarea sa where sa.author_id = #{authorId} and sa.disabled = 0
mapper.insert: insert into t_studyarea( id, create_date, disabled, maxlat, maxlng, minlat, minlng, author_id )values( #{id}, #{createDate}, #{disabled}, #{maxlat}, #{maxlng}, #{minlat}, #{minlng}, #{authorId} )
mapper.select: select sa.author_id as authorId, sa.create_date as createDate, sa.disabled, sa.id, sa.maxlat, sa.maxlng, sa.minlat, sa.minlng from t_studyarea sa where sa.author_id = #{authorId} and sa.disabled = 0 and sa.create_date > #{from}
